title: American-style meatloaf with sweet & sour glaze

ingredients.item: ½ x 250g pack (or 6 rashers) essential Waitrose Smoked Streaky Bacon
500g pack essential Waitrose Minced Beef (10% fat)
1 stick essential Waitrose Celery, finely grated
1 essential Waitrose Carrot, peeled and finely grated
½ tsp essential Waitrose Dijon Mustard

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7. Line a 900g non-stick loaf tin with the bacon rashers, making sure they don’t overlap.

Mix the remaining meatloaf ingredients together in a large bowl, then transfer to the prepared loaf tin. Finish by tucking the ends of the bacon over the top of the loaf. Roast for 20 minutes, until partly cooked. Mix the glaze ingredients together.
Remove from the oven and turn out onto a baking sheet. Brush with the glaze, then return to the oven for 25 minutes. Serve warm, in thick slices. Delicious with corn on the cob and a green salad.
